chinese: 螽斯羽、詵詵兮。宜爾子孫、振振兮。
english: Ye locusts, winged tribes,How harmoniously you collect together!Right is it that your descendantsShould be multitudinous!

chinese: 螽斯羽、薨薨兮。宜爾子孫、繩繩兮。
english: Ye locusts, winged tribes,How sound your wings in flight!Right is it that your descendentsShould be as in unbroken strings!

chinese: 螽斯羽、揖揖兮。宜爾子孫、蟄蟄兮。
english: Ye locusts, winged tribes,How you cluster together!Right is it that your descendentsShould be in swarms!
